title: NCLAT dismisses Hinduja Leyland Finance plea for insolvency proceedings against Fly Express - The Financial Express
content: NCLAT dismisses Hinduja Leyland Finance plea for insolvency proceedings against Fly Express  The Financial Express
description: This was challenged by the Hinduja Group firm before the National Company Law Appellate Tribunal contending that December 24, 2022 was wrongly mentioned as the date of default in the petition before NCLT.
